title: Apply pill-shaped (rounded-full) border radius to specified inputs and buttons

requirements.summary: Make the Header search input pill-shaped by applying a fully-rounded (9999px equivalent) border radius across responsive layouts.
acceptanceCriteria: On all pages where the Header is shown, the search input renders with a pill-shaped/fully-rounded border radius.
The updated border radius applies consistently in both light and dark themes.
The search input focus/hover styles still render correctly (no clipping or visual artifacts at the corners).

file_operations.description: Update both desktop and mobile Header <Input type="search" /> usages to include Tailwind fully-rounded styling (e.g., add `rounded-full` to the existing className alongside `pl-10`) so the search field appears pill-shaped without changing shared UI components under frontend/src/components/ui.

requirements.summary: Make all Header buttons pill-shaped by applying a fully-rounded (9999px equivalent) border radius across desktop and mobile header layouts.
acceptanceCriteria: All clickable button-style controls in `frontend/src/components/Header.tsx` render with a fully-rounded/pill border radius.
No Header button regresses in spacing/alignment (icons and text remain centered).
Mobile header and desktop header both reflect the fully-rounded styling.

file_operations.description: Add `rounded-full` to the className for every Button instance rendered by Header (including icon buttons, dropdown trigger, nav buttons, and the mobile search dialog submit button) to ensure consistent pill-shaped styling while preserving existing variants/sizes and without editing any files under frontend/src/components/ui.

requirements.summary: Make the 'Start a Pond' button on the All Ponds page pill-shaped by applying a fully-rounded border radius.
acceptanceCriteria: On `frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx`, the 'Start a Pond' button displays as fully-rounded/pill-shaped.
The button remains visually consistent with other primary actions (no loss of padding, font size, or hover/focus behavior).

file_operations.description: Update the 'Start a Pond' <Button asChild> on AllPondsPage to include `rounded-full` in its className while keeping existing hover/focus behavior and without modifying shared UI components under frontend/src/components/ui.

requirements.summary: Make the 'Save Changes', 'Save Froggy Phrase', and 'Choose Avatar' buttons on the User Settings page pill-shaped by applying a fully-rounded border radius.
acceptanceCriteria: On `frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx`, each of the three specified buttons renders with a fully-rounded/pill-shaped border radius.
Button disabled/loading states (if present) still look correct with the new border radius.
No other settings controls unintentionally change shape unless they are one of the specified buttons.

file_operations.description: Add `rounded-full` only to the specified buttons on UserSettingsPage: the 'Save Changes' Button, the 'Save Froggy Phrase' Button (when creating a phrase), and the 'Choose Avatar' Button (the outline Button rendered asChild within the Label), ensuring disabled/loading visuals remain intact and avoiding changes to other buttons not listed.
